Package Classes.Reservation

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.Reservation.ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager extends Object
The ReservationManager Class Create, check, delete and list the reservations and automatically delete the expired reservations.
Since:
2021-11-02

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReservationManager()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    changeTableStatusToEmpty​(Reservation r)
    Method to change the table status to EMPTY if the reservation is deleted at its reserved session
    static void
    checkExpiredReservations()
    Method to automatedly delete the reservation after 30 minutes of its reservation time and the customer(s) haven't showed up This method will be called once a minute in the MainApp
    static int
    checkReservationBooking()
    Method to check the reservation booking information according to the input reservation id If there is no reservation record linked to the reservation number, -1 will be returned for further checking purposes
    static void
    createReservationBooking()
    Creating a new reservation booking Get inputs from user: Customer name, customer contact, date, time of reservation and no of pax
    static int
    findTableForReservation​(int cusCount, LocalDate resvDate, char session)
    Method to find the first suitable table given the number of customers, reservation date and session The table will be arranged according to the capacity, so the output will be the first table that best fit the requirements
    static ArrayList<Reservation>
    getReservationCollection()
    Accessor for reservation collection
    static ArrayList<Table>
    getTableBookedByDateAndSession​(LocalDate date, Reservation.ReservationSession session)
    Method to check the booked (unavailable) tables at the given date and session.
    static int
    getTableIDByReservationID​(int id)
    Method to return the reserved table id by the input reservation ID
    static boolean
    isCurrentSession​(Reservation r)
    Method to check whether the reservation session is the current session
    static boolean
    isToday​(Reservation r)
    Method to check whether the reservation date is today
    static boolean
    notComeYet​(Reservation r)
    Method to check whether the customers have arrived or not by checking the status of the table they reserved
    static boolean
    passedThirtyMinutes​(Reservation r)
    Method to check whether the reservation has passed for 30 minutes
    static void
    printAllReservations()
    Method to print all reservations after the current time The reservation will be printed in ascending order of reservation id The expired reservations and the past reservations will not be printed
    static void
    removeReservationBooking()
    Method to delete the reservation booking information according to the input reservation id The method will call checkReservationBooking() first to check if the input is valid If checkReservationBooking() returns -1, it means the input reservation id is not valid If the input id is correct, the reservation record will be deleted from the list If the reservation is deleted at its reserved session, the status of table will also be changed to EMPTY

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public ReservationManager()

  • Method Details

    • getReservationCollection

      public static ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationCollection()
      Accessor for reservation collection
      Returns:
      the reservation collection in arraylist

    • createReservationBooking

      public static void createReservationBooking()
      Creating a new reservation booking Get inputs from user: Customer name, customer contact, date, time of reservation and no of pax

    • getTableBookedByDateAndSession

      public static ArrayList<Table> getTableBookedByDateAndSession​(LocalDate date, Reservation.ReservationSession session)
      Method to check the booked (unavailable) tables at the given date and session. The booked tables will be returned in an arraylist
      Parameters:
      date - The given date to check tables' availability
      session - The given session to check tables' availability
      Returns:
      The arraylist of tables that are booked, empty if all table are available at that given date and session

    • findTableForReservation

      public static int findTableForReservation​(int cusCount, LocalDate resvDate, char session)
      Method to find the first suitable table given the number of customers, reservation date and session The table will be arranged according to the capacity, so the output will be the first table that best fit the requirements
      Parameters:
      cusCount - The given number of customers
      resvDate - The given date to check tables' availability
      session - The given session to check tables' availability
      Returns:
      the first table id if there exists a table that fit the requirements, -1 if all tables are occupied

    • printAllReservations

      public static void printAllReservations()
      Method to print all reservations after the current time The reservation will be printed in ascending order of reservation id The expired reservations and the past reservations will not be printed

    • checkReservationBooking

      public static int checkReservationBooking()
      Method to check the reservation booking information according to the input reservation id If there is no reservation record linked to the reservation number, -1 will be returned for further checking purposes
      Returns:
      the reservation Id the user wants to check, -1 if the input is not valid

    • removeReservationBooking

      public static void removeReservationBooking()
      Method to delete the reservation booking information according to the input reservation id The method will call checkReservationBooking() first to check if the input is valid If checkReservationBooking() returns -1, it means the input reservation id is not valid If the input id is correct, the reservation record will be deleted from the list If the reservation is deleted at its reserved session, the status of table will also be changed to EMPTY

    • isToday

      public static boolean isToday​(Reservation r)
      Method to check whether the reservation date is today
      Parameters:
      r - reservation
      Returns:
      isToday is true if the reservation is today, othervise false

    • isCurrentSession

      public static boolean isCurrentSession​(Reservation r)
      Method to check whether the reservation session is the current session
      Parameters:
      r - reservation
      Returns:
      isCurrentSession is true if the reservation session is the current session, othervise false

    • passedThirtyMinutes

      public static boolean passedThirtyMinutes​(Reservation r)
      Method to check whether the reservation has passed for 30 minutes
      Parameters:
      r - reservation
      Returns:
      passedThirtyMinutes is true if the reservation has passed for 30 minutes, otherwise false

    • notComeYet

      public static boolean notComeYet​(Reservation r)
      Method to check whether the customers have arrived or not by checking the status of the table they reserved
      Parameters:
      r - reservation
      Returns:
      notComeYet is true if the customers haven't arrvied, otherwise false

    • changeTableStatusToEmpty

      public static void changeTableStatusToEmpty​(Reservation r)
      Method to change the table status to EMPTY if the reservation is deleted at its reserved session
      Parameters:
      r - reservation

    • checkExpiredReservations

      public static void checkExpiredReservations()
      Method to automatedly delete the reservation after 30 minutes of its reservation time and the customer(s) haven't showed up This method will be called once a minute in the MainApp

    • getTableIDByReservationID

      public static int getTableIDByReservationID​(int id)
      Method to return the reserved table id by the input reservation ID
      Parameters:
      id - reservation id
      Returns:
      the table id according to the reservation id, -1 if the reservation id is not valid
